name: Corrupted Memories
description:
[This game was created during the GameDevWeek game jam in Trier, Germany]

Uncover the mystery of your memories through different dreams in various environments while trying to escape the inevitable - death.
You start in your parent's old house, the place you grew up in. The place you once called home has turned into a lifeless, empty husk. Ever since their mysterious death you wondered what exactly had happened to them. The only thing you can piece together from that fateful evening is running into a nearby forest - the rest remains to be uncovered - you just need to remember.
